src:
Sarakunan Afrika sun baiwa Paul Biya lambar yabo
02 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Abdoulaye Issa

Wata kungiyar sarakunan gargajiyar nahiyar Afrika da ta gudanar da wani taro a Jamhuriyar Benin,taron da ya samu halartar Shuwagabanin gargajiya da daga kasashen Afrika ya bukaci yan siyasar nahiyar su saka shuwagabanin gargajiya a cikin harakokin tafiyar da alâ€™amuran mulki a nahiyar.

Har ila yau taron ya karama Shugaban kasar Kamaru Paul Biya kan kokarin da yake wajen sake samar da zaman lafiya a kasar ta Kamaru.
Shugaban wannan kungiya da ake kira Panafrican Council of Traditional and Customary Authorities PACTCA, Dada Awiyan Octave Sarkin Dahe a jamhuriyar Benin ya bayyana Shugaban Kamaru Paul Biya a matsayin mutumen dake da hangen nesa.
Shugaban kungiyar ya na mai fatan Shugabanin Afrika za su yi koyi tareda saka Sarakunan gargajiya a lamuran yau da na kullum a hukumance.
text:
African kings have given Paul Biya a medal
02 Nov 2019, 14:10 by Abdoulaye Issa

A group of traditional African rulers held a meeting in Benin Republic, a meeting attended by traditional and African leaders, urging local politicians to include traditional leaders in the affairs of the continent.

The meeting also honored the President of Cameroon, Paul Biya, on his efforts to restore peace in Cameroon.
President of the Panafrican Council of Traditional and Customary Authorities PACTCA, Dada Awiya Octave King of Dahe in Benin has described President Paul Biya as a visionary.
The president hopes that African leaders will learn by imposing traditional rulers on regular occasions.
